data.description: Job Description SummaryCome and join our powerful, unified force with the energy to change the world. Our mission is BIG.Our TRANSFORMATION is key – bringing the right businesses together to LEAD the ENERGY TRANSITION. Our TEAM is ready.Addressing the climate crisis is an urgent global priority and we take our responsibility seriously. Building on over 130 years of experience tackling the world’s challenges, GE Vernova is uniquely positioned to help lead the energy transition by continuing to electrify the world while simultaneously working to decarbonize it. GE Vernova helps customers power economies and deliver electricity that is vital to health, safety, security, and improved quality of life.Job DescriptionThe Decarbonization & AI Solutions Intern will support the development of digital tools and AI-driven solutions that accelerate GE Vernova’s decarbonization efforts. This role combines technical expertise in AI with a deep understanding of sustainability principles to create innovative applications for reducing emissions across operations, products, and supply chains. The intern will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement proof-of-concept solutions that leverage advanced analytics, machine learning, and optimization models.Project Outcomes:Assist in building AI models to analyze emissions data, forecast reductions, and optimize energy use.Support the development of decision-support tools for decarbonization strategies.Integrate relevant sustainability datasets into machine learning pipelines for actionable insights.Conduct research on emerging AI techniques for carbon tracking, lifecycle analysis, and energy efficiency.Work with stakeholders to validate models and ensure alignment with business decarbonization goals.Primary Skills Developed:AI-Driven Emissions Analytics Tool – A prototype tool that predicts emissions trends and identifies high-impact reduction opportunities using ML algorithms.Carbon Optimization Engine – A model that optimizes energy usage and resource allocation for minimal carbon impact.Integrated Emissions Dataset – A consolidated database of operational and supply chain carbon data for AI applications.Proof-of-Concept AI Use Cases – Documented scenarios where AI supports carbon neutrality strategies (e.g., renewable integration, load balancing).Scalability & Implementation Plan – Recommendations for integrating AI-driven solutions into GE Vernova’s decarbonization roadmap.Internship Term Dates:May/June - August 2026Qualifications:Pursuing a Master’s degree, MBA, or Doctorate in Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, Environmental Science, Sustainability, Business, or a related field from an accredited institution.Minimum GPA 4.0 / 5.0 scale.Proven experience or coursework in modeling, artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing.Demonstrated familiarity with sustainability concepts, including Greenhouse Gas accounting and emissions reduction strategies.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.Desired Qualifications:Prior internship or research experience in sustainability, climate solutions, AI, or digital transformation projects.Experience developing conversational AI solutions, chatbots, or related applications.Hands-on proficiency with programming languages such as Python, and relevant AI/NLP libraries.Hands on experience with Greenhouse Gas Accounting, carbon forecasting, or environmental impact modeling.Knowledge of data integration, database management, and data privacy/security best practices.Experience collaborating in multidisciplinary or cross-functional teams.Familiarity with user experience (UX) design principles, especially for digital tools in sustainability.Passion for advancing the energy transition and supporting climate action through innovative solutions.Benefits Available to you: Addressing the climate crisis is an urgent global priority, and at GE Vernova, we take our responsibility seriously. That is the singular mission of GE Vernova: to continue electrifying the world while simultaneously working to help decarbonize it. In order to meet this mission, we provide varied, competitive benefits to help support our workforce: Our Culture | GE Vernova (gecareers.com)The pay for this position ranges from $1,000 - $2,000 weekly based on years of undergraduate/graduate field of study completedThis position is also eligible for:Relocation Assistance: Co-op/Interns will be reimbursed for reasonable, proper, and documented expenditures incurred while initially reporting to work and returning to school/home upon completion of the assignment. Employees with a permanent address greater than 50 miles away from the work location are eligible.Housing Allowance: Co-op/Interns employees receive a weekly housing allowance to help off-set living expenses when the co-op/Intern’s permanent residence is at least 50 miles away from the work location.Employee Assistance Program, providing 24/7 confidential assessment, counseling and referral servicesGE Retirement Savings Plan (RSP) after their accumulated service reaches 90 days, and they meet any other eligibility requirements as defined in the plans. (Eligibility occurs on the 1st of the month following the 90th day.)General Electric Company, Ropcor, Inc., their successors, and in some cases their affiliates, each sponsor certain employee benefit plans or programs (i.e., is a Sponsor”). Each Sponsor reserves the right to terminate, amend, suspend, replace, or modify its benefit plans and programs at any time and for any reason, in its sole discretion. No individual has a vested right to any benefit under a Sponsor’s welfare benefit plan or program. This document does not create a contract of employment with any individual.Inclusion At GE Vernova, we believe in the value of your unique identity, background and experiences. We are committed to fostering an inclusive culture, where everyone feels empowered to do their best work because they feel accepted, respected and that they belong. Click here to learn more: https://jobs.gecareers.com/vernova/global/en/i-d-eAdditional InformationGE Vernova offers a great work environment, professional development, challenging careers, and competitive compensation. GE Vernova is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.GE Vernova will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States for this opening. Any offer of employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of a drug screen (as applicable). Relocation Assistance Provided: No
